MESSAGES.THANKYOU_BODY: Thank you for using Self-care. Hope we could make your experience better.
MESSAGES.MOVING_ELIFE_CONNECTION: We are moving your eLife connection
MESSAGES.MOVING_ELIFE_CONNECTION_BODY_1: The service will be discontinued while the transfer is under process.
MESSAGES.MOVING_ELIFE_CONNECTION_BODY_2: Try using it once your eLife connection has been moved successfully.
MESSAGES.ACCOUNT_TEMPORARILY_DISCONNECTED_BODY: The service won’t work as your account has been disconnected temporarily based upon your request. The service will be back on <XXX>. Click here if you want to reconnect your service.
MESSAGES.ELIFE_CANCELLATION_REQUEST_PROGRESS: You eLife service cancellation request is in progress
MESSAGES.ELIFE_CANCELLATION_REQUEST_PROGRESS_BODY: The service won’t work as your account is being cancelled based upon your request.
MESSAGES.COMPLAINT_ALREADY_EXISTS_BODY: Our technicians are already working on resolving the issue. Do you want to follow-up on the same complaint?
MESSAGES.APPOINTMENT_BOOK_SUCCESSFULLY_BODY: We have received your complain and booked an appointment. Our technician will contact you soon
MESSAGES.OPEN_SERVICE_REQUEST_BODY: We noticed that there is an open Service Request
MESSAGES.PACKAGE_UPGRADE_REQUEST_SUCCESSFULLY: Package upgrade request was raised successfully
MESSAGES.PACKAGE_UPGRADE_REQUEST_SUCCESSFULLY_BOD: Thank you for your request. We will call you back within 24 hrs.
MESSAGES.ROUTER_UPGRADE_REQUEST_SUCCESSFULLY: Router upgrade request was raised successfully
MESSAGES.ROUTER_UPGRADE_REQUEST_SUCCESSFULLY_BODY: Thank you for your request. We will call you back within 24 hrs.
MESSAGES.ACCOUNT_DISCONNECTED_TEMPORARILY_BODY: if you wish to get bill details / make payment
MESSAGES.ROUTER_PACKAGE_UPGRADE_REQUEST_SUCCESSFU: Router & Package upgrade request was raised successfully
Thank you for your request. We will call you back within 24 hrs.
MESSAGES.THIRD_PARTY_ROUTER_REQUEST_SUCCESSFULLY: New router request was raised successfully
MESSAGES.THIRD_PARTY_ROUTER_REQUEST_SUCCESSFULLY_: Thank you for your request. We will call you back within 24 hrs.
MESSAGES.RESET_WIIF_PASSWORD_FIRST_SUCCESSFULLY_B: Please wait for 5 minutes before using the internet again.  Continue to configure your Wi-Fi settings.
MESSAGES.RESET_WIIF_PASSWORD_SECOND_SUCCESSFULLY_: Please wait for 5 minutes and then try using the internet again.  Your new password is <XXXX>.Make sure to use the new Wi-Fi password to connect to the router.
MESSAGES.TROUBLESHOOT_COMPLETE_BODY: we couldn't find any technical problem with the service. You can book an appointment with a technician if you're still facing an issue. Please note that you might get charged AED 150 for the technician visit if the issue isn't from our side.

TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS.PARA1: By accepting the T&C, you confirm that all information by you is correct and you bear responsibility if there will be any discrepancy in the documents and will liable for the action.
TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS.PARA2: Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur. Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum.

ROUTER_RESTART.RESTART_ROUTER_H2: You can follow these steps to reboot your router
ROUTER_RESTART.RESTART_ROUTER_H3: Consult device care for specific device guides
ROUTER_RESTART.ROUTER_DIDNOT_RESTART_H2: Follow these steps to restart your router
ROUTER_RESTART.ROUTER_DIDNOT_RESTART_H3_MSG: Where you can find more details on how to restart your router.

DIALOG.PASSWORD_WASNOT_RESET_DESCRIPTION: Please note that the issue won't be fixed until the password is changed and the router is configured with the new password
DIALOG.INTERNET_ISSUE_CONTINUE: Once you complete these steps, tap 'Continue'.
DIALOG.INTERNET_ISSUE_EXIST_TROUBLESHOOTING: If you want to complete these steps later, tap 'Exist troubleshooting'.
DIALOG.RESTART_ROUTER_INS1: Please note that the issue won't be fixed until you restart your router.
DIALOG.RESTART_ROUTER_INS2: You can also restart your router manually.
DIALOG.RESTART_ROUTER_INS3: Once you restart your router, wait for 5 minutes and then try using the internet again.
DIALOG.INTERNET_ISSUE_LIST_MESSAGE: Check wi-fi coverage guidlines to solve connectivity issues.
DIALOG.RESET_FACTORY_DEFAULT_DESCRIPTION: The router's Wi-Fi will be reset to default factory settings.
DIALOG.RESET_FACTORY_DEFAULT_NOTE: Note: You will lose all settings after the factory reset.
DIALOG.ROUTER_NOT_REACHABLE_DESCRIPTION: Please check if:• Router is switched on• The cable from the router is connected to the 'X' port of the wall mounted fibre box Once you complete these steps, tap 'Continue'.If you want to complete these steps later, tap 'Exit troubleshooting'.

LOADER.SUCCESS_BODY_1: Please wait while our automated system is diagnosing the service.
LOADER.SUCCESS_BODY_2: This will take up to 1 minute
LOADER.FALIURE_BODY: It is taking longer than expected. Kindly wait

BROWSERSTEPPER.DESCRIPTION1_STEP1: Select the operating system and browser from the drop-down menu in order to learn more about proxy configuration.
BROWSERSTEPPER.DESCRIPTION2_STEP1: Please make sure that your PC/laptop browser is configured with the correct proxy settings.
BROWSERSTEPPER.IMG_TEXT_STEP1: Picture or animated GIF of how to reach proxy configuration setting in a browser
BROWSERSTEPPER.DESCRIPTION1_STEP2: Select the operating system and type of connectivity (Wi-Fi or LAN cable) from the drop-down menu in order to learn more about DNS configuration.
BROWSERSTEPPER.DESCRIPTION2_STEP2: Please make sure that your PC/laptop browser is configured with the correct DNS settings.
BROWSERSTEPPER.DESCRIPTION1_STEP3: Select the operating system and browser from the drop-down menu in order to learn more about proxy configuration.

DEVICE_CONNECTED_HOMEZONE.HEADING: Device connected to Home Zone
DEVICE_CONNECTED_HOMEZONE.SUB_HEADING: Unable to connect to Home Zone
DEVICE_CONNECTED_HOMEZONE.PARAGRAPH1: Make sure to select your Wi-Fi network name Use the correct Wi-Fi password while connecting to your Wi-Fi network.
DEVICE_CONNECTED_HOMEZONE.PARAGRAPH2: We can help you to reset Wi-Fi settings if you forgot your Wi-Fi password
